article_title: Medal for mettle: Yuma vet waits 67 years for medal
article_text:

og.description: After being within 20 miles of two atomic bomb blasts and outliving most of his crew mates, U.S. Navy veteran Charles W. Ray has finally received a medal for which he had waited 67 years.
